name: $set2048GameButtonStyle
description: Sets the 2048 game options for buttonStyle property

name: $set2048GameEmbed
description: Sets the 2048 game options for embeds property

args.name: property
args.description: The embed property to set as

args.name: value
args.description: The value to set as. (Leave Blank for the defualt one)

name: $set2048GameEmoji
description: Sets the 2048 game options for emojis property

args.name: property
args.description: The emojis property to set as

args.name: value
args.description: The value to set as. (Leave Blank for the default one)

name: $set2048GameTimeout
description: Sets the 2048 game options for timeout property

args.name: result
args.description: The env variable name to load results of the game. (Default: result)
